channel.title: Writeup on Sequr
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on Sequr

item.description: Write-up of the Nest machine by VbScrub on HackTheBox.eu.

item.description: Write-up of the Sauna machine by egotisticalSW on HackTheBox.eu.

item.title: Infiltration
item.description: Write-up of the Infiltration OSINT challenge by greenwolf on HackTheBox.eu. Can you find something to help you break into the company ‘Evil Corp LLC’. Recon social media sites to see if you can find any useful information.

item.title: Easy Phish
item.description: Write-up of the Easy Phish OSINT challenge by greenwolf on HackTheBox.eu. Customers of secure-startup.com have been recieving some very convincing phishing emails, can you figure out why?

item.title: Traceback
item.description: Write-up of the Traceback lab machine by Xh4H on HackTheBox.eu. Owned user and root.

item.title: Challenge write-ups
item.description: Write-ups for challenges which aren’t yet archived or aren’t open for write-ups, will be password protected with the challenge or root flag.

item.title: Traverxec
item.description: Write-up of the Traverxec machine by jkr on HackTheBox.eu.

item.title: M0rsarchive
item.description: Write-up of the M0rsarchive misc challenge by swani on HackTheBox.eu. Just unzip the archive … several times …

item.title: FreeLancer
item.description: Write-up of the Freelancer web challenge by IhsanSencan on HackTheBox.eu. Can you test how secure my website is? Prove me wrong and capture the flag!

item.title: Networked
item.description: Write-up of the Networked machine by guly on HackTheBox.eu.

item.title: Crooked Crockford
item.description: Write-up of the Crooked Crockford misc challenge by sx02089 on HackTheBox.eu. Some bits are missing.

item.title: Blackhole
item.description: Write-up of the Blackhole misc challenge by ice3man on HackTheBox.eu. A strange file has been discovered in Stephen Hawking’s computer.

item.title: Longbottomâ€™s Locker
item.description: Write-up of the Longbottom’s Locker misc challenge by felli0t on HackTheBox.eu. Break into Longbottom’s vault and steal his secrets.

item.title: Eternal Loop
item.description: Write-up of the Eternal Loop misc challenge by MinatoTW on HackTheBox.eu. Can you find a way out of this loop?

item.title: misDIRection
item.description: Write-up of the misDIRection misc challenge by incidrthreat on HackTheBox.eu. During an assessment of a unix system the HTB team found a suspicious directory.

item.title: Inferno
item.description: Write-up of the Inferno misc challenge by Untao on HackTheBox.eu. Find the flag.

item.title: Art
item.description: Write-up of the Art misc challenge by Hexp on HackTheBox.eu. Can you find the flag?

item.title: 0ld is g0ld
item.description: Write-up of the 0ld is g0ld misc challenge by subzer0x0 on HackTheBox.eu. Old algorithms are not a waste, but are really precious…

item.title: fs0ciety
item.description: Write-up of the fs0ciety misc challenge by subzer0x0 on HackTheBox.eu. Can you crack the ‘ZIP’ folder and get the SSH password?

item.title: I know Mag1k
item.description: Write-up of the I know Mag1k web challenge by rkmylo on HackTheBox.eu. Can you get to the profile page of the admin?

item.title: Lernaean
item.description: Write-up of the Lernaean web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. Our target is not very good with computers.

item.title: Fuzzy
item.description: Write-up of the Fuzzy web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. We have gained access to some infrastructure which we believe is connected to the internal network of our target.

item.title: Cartographer
item.description: Write-up of the Cartographer web challenge by Arraxel on HackTheBox.eu. Can you break in and see what they are up to?

item.title: Emdee five for life
item.description: Write-up of the Emdee five for life web challenge by L4mpje on HackTheBox.eu. Can you encrypt fast enough?

item.description: Write-up of the Writeup lab machine by jkr on HackTheBox.eu. Owned user and root.
